data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: Blazing past the obeying traffic, the getaway vehicle reached a peak speed of 80 mph on this enthralling police chase. Contrary to belief, this getaway vehicle was running low on gas. In a swift drift, the driver was able to get to the nearest petrol station. As he quickly got out to get the diesel pump, his clumsy friend accidently dropped his cigarette butt causing a mass fire, effectively ending the lives of these criminals on the spot.
data.original_output: Blazing past the obeying traffic, the getaway vehicle reached a peak speed of 80 mph on this enthralling police chase. Contrary to belief, this getaway vehicle was running low on gas. In a swift drift, the driver was able to get to the nearest petrol station. As he quickly got out to get the diesel pump, his clumsy friend accidently dropped his cigarette butt causing a mass fire, effectively ending the lives of these criminals on the spot.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: The newest member of the stamp club blitzed through the school corridor in an attempt to make a punctual start to his time at the club. In the event of this rush, he dropped his most valuable stamp as it slipped out of his book beyond the boy's knowledge. 2 hours later, he made his way back to same route he took, only to find that somebody else had already used his stamp to send off a letter.
data.original_output: The newest member of the stamp club blitzed through the school corridor in an attempt to make a punctual start to his time at the club. In the event of this rush, he dropped his most valuable stamp as it slipped out of his book beyond the boy's knowledge. 2 hours later, he made his way back to same route he took, only to find that somebody else had already used his stamp to send off a letter.

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: During this revolutionary World War battle between England and Russia, the Russians used their advanced artillery to their advantage. The English were outworn as the Russian empire continued to overload the English territory. This was emphasised when Captain John Rogers of England was struck by a grenade which graphically exposed some of his body organs. As he breathed his final breath, Sir John Rogers passed on a message to his soldiers; "Never give in, for the future of England is in our hands." His soldiers made sure to comply with this message.
data.original_output: During this revolutionary World War battle between England and Russia, the Russians used their advanced artillery to their advantage. The English were outworn as the Russian empire continued to overload the English territory. This was emphasised when Captain John Rogers of England was struck by a grenade which graphically exposed some of his body organs. As he breathed his final breath, Sir John Rogers passed on a message to his soldiers; "Never give in, for the future of England is in our hands." His soldiers made sure to comply with this message.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: The single mother rushed home as awaited the news of the latest lottery draw. Her ticket was kindly given to her by her son, Phil. Watching in excitement, she was on the edge of her seat as each number matched the draw thinking about all the payments she could make. In ecstasy, she leapt out of her seat as she discovered she won the jackpot! However, she soon learns that her son Phil was pranking her, plummeting her joy to an all-time low, all she felt was gloom as she wished her son ceased to exist.
